mapper.sql: id, commodity_id, picture_id, sort_value, create_time, update_time, platform_id
mapper.select: SELECT cp.id, cp.commodity_id, cp.picture_id, cp.sort_value, cp.create_time, cp.update_time, cp.platform_id, p.url picture_url from commodity_picture cp LEFT JOIN picture p on cp.picture_id = p.id WHERE cp.commodity_id = #{commodityId} ORDER BY cp.sort_value
